name: boundsRect(for:contentRect:in:textContainer:characterRange:)
desc: Returns the rectangle the text table block actually occupies, including padding, borders, and margins.
declaration:
func boundsRect(for block: NSTextTableBlock, 
    contentRect: NSRect, 
             in rect: NSRect, 
  textContainer: NSTextContainer, 
 characterRange charRange: NSRange) -> NSRect
